attributes.action: Put a ban on the UK sale of 4x4 vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All terrain off road vehicles are extremely dangerous for Britains roads, and they have been known to roll over on one side after a stronger wind has hit them. Another problem with 4x4's is that they cause problems for the environment, not to mention killing or seriously injuring cyclists and over motorists in the process.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
